reckoning.title: An Unsettling Trend
reckoning.entry: For each investigator with a Bound Ally, raise the terror level by 1.

reckoning.title: Beyond Control
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with a Soul Pact gains 1 Power for each point of Sanity he currently has. He then reduces his maximum Sanity by 2.

reckoning.title: Blood Boils
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with a Blood Pact gains 1 Power for each point of Stamina he currently has. He then reduces his maximum Stamina by 2.

reckoning.title: Devotion Beyond Reason
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with a Bound Ally must discard all of his money and items.

reckoning.title: His Undivided Attention
reckoning.entry: Draw the next 2 Reckoning cards from the deck and resolve them both, one at a time in the order drawn.

reckoning.title: Lest You Wither Away
reckoning.entry: Each investigator may choose to immediately gain 1 or more Dark Pacts. Then, if there is at least 1 investigator who does not have a Dark Pact, each investigator who does have a Dark Pact reduces his maximum Stamina by 1.

reckoning.title: Merely a Vessel
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with 1 or more Power tokens in Arkham is delayed. Each investigator with 1 or more Power tokens in an Other World is lost in time and space.

reckoning.title: So Easy to Break
reckoning.entry: Each investigator that has a Dark Pact but does not currently have a Blood Pact loses 2 Stamina.

reckoning.title: Surrender Your Soul
reckoning.entry: Each investigator that has a Dark Pact but does not currently have a Soul Pact loses 2 Sanity.

reckoning.title: The Barriers Crumble
reckoning.entry: A gate opens and a monster appears in each unstable location containing an investigator with 1 or more Dark Pacts (if there is not already a gate in that location).

reckoning.title: The Legacy of Blood
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with a Blood Pact is devoured. The new investigator chosen to replace him starts with a Blood Pact and 3 Power tokens in addition to his other fixed possessions.

reckoning.title: The Legacy of Madness
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with a Soul Pact is devoured. The new investigator chosen to replace him starts with a Soul Pact and 3 Power tokens in addition to his other fixed possessions.

reckoning.title: The Voices Beckon
reckoning.entry: Each investigator may choose to immediately gain 1 or more Dark Pacts. Then, if there is at least 1 investigator who does not have a Dark Pact, each investigator who does have a Dark Pact reduces his maximum Sanity by 1.

reckoning.title: Traveler of the Paths
reckoning.entry: Each investigator with 2 or more Dark Pacts must immediately return all of his gate trophies face down to the bottom of the pile of gate markers.
